item.title: 德国和法国带头呼吁欧洲投资银行加强国防融资
item.description: 德国和法国与其他 12 个欧盟国家一道，呼吁欧洲投资银行加强国防融资，作为在俄罗斯入侵的情况下增强欧盟安全的一种手段。【原文：Germany and France joined 12 other European Union countries in calling for the European Investment Bank to enhance its financing for defense as a means to boost the bloc’s security in light of Russian aggression.】

item.title: Shift4 首席执行官告诉员工，收购出价未能充分评估公司价值
item.description: Shift4 Payments Inc.首席执行官贾里德-艾萨克曼（Jared Isaacman）说，潜在收购者的出价未能 "充分估价 "这家支付公司。【原文：Shift4 Payments Inc. Chief Executive Officer Jared Isaacman said bids from potential suitors have failed to “sufficiently value” the payments firm.】

item.title: 阿布扎比加快乡村俱乐部准入以吸引对冲基金
item.description: 阿布扎比的官员们正在悄悄地策划一套新的福利方案，他们希望这套方案能帮助阿布扎比在世界最大金融中心的行列中崭露头角，包括帮助交易商为他们的子女获得梦寐以求的学校入学资格，以及帮助他们获得乡村俱乐部的会员资格。【原文：Abu Dhabi officials are quietly orchestrating a fresh package of perks they hope will help propel the city up the ranks of the world’s biggest financial centers, from helping traders obtain coveted school admissions for their children to assisting them with securing memberships at country clubs.】

item.title: 交易员从消费类股票中寻找美联储走向的线索
item.description: 随着美联储准备在本周召开会议并透露他们对利率走势的看法，交易员们正在股市的一个关键角落寻找线索：生产美国人购买的商品的公司股票。【原文：With the Federal Reserve prepared to meet this week and reveal their thinking about the path for interest rates, traders are looking to a key corner of the stock market for clues: shares of companies that make the stuff Americans buy.】

item.title: 航空公司削减计划，波音公司的痛苦波及旅客
item.description: 波音公司 2024 年灾难性的开局正波及航空公司及其乘客，因为这家美国飞机制造商的生产延误加剧了本已初现端倪的单通道喷气式飞机的短缺，而单通道喷气式飞机是商业航空旅行的支柱。【原文：Boeing Co.’s disastrous start to 2024 is spilling over to airlines and their passengers as production delays at the US planemaker exacerbate an already nascent shortage of single-aisle jets that form the backbone of commercial air travel.】

item.title: 前沿市场以 "彻底转变 "赢得债券投资者青睐
item.description: 前沿市场已开始积极转变政策，本币债券投资者也开始从中获益。【原文：Frontier markets have embarked on aggressive policy shifts, and investors in local-currency bonds are starting to reap the benefits.】

item.title: 据说沙特财富基金正在洽谈收购国家航空公司事宜
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金正在就收购沙特旗舰航空公司进行早期谈判，该基金希望投入数十亿美元将沙特打造成旅游热点。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is in early talks to acquire the kingdom’s flagship carrier as it looks to pour billions of dollars into turning the country into a tourism hotspot.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长德科斯称首次降息可能在 6 月到来
Binance CEO Teng 预计比特币将因 ETF 流入而突破 80,000 美元
item.description: Binance 首席执行官理查德-滕（Richard Teng）表示，随着机构投资者将更多资金投入加密货币支持的交易所交易基金，比特币将继续破纪录的涨势，并升至 8 万美元以上。【原文：Bitcoin is set to continue its record-breaking rally and rise above $80,000 as institutional investors pour more money into the crypto-backed exchange-traded funds, according to Binance Chief Executive Officer Richard Teng.】

item.title: 中央银行行长表示，荷兰新政府必须严格管理财政
item.description: 2022年10月12日星期三，在美国华盛顿特区举行的国际金融学会（IIF）年度会员大会上，荷兰银行总裁克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）发表讲话。今年会议的主题是 "在不确定、调整和转型时代寻求稳定"。摄影师：Ting Shen/Bloomberg【原文：Klaas Knot, president, De Nederlandsche Bank N.V., speaks during the Institute of International Finance (IIF) annual membership meeting in Washington, DC, US, on Wednesday, Oct. 12, 2022. This year's conference theme is "The Search for Stability in an Era of Uncertainty, Realignment and Transformation." Photographer: Ting Shen/Bloomberg】

item.title: BAT 首席执行官称将上市地点迁至纽约是分散注意力：金融时报
item.description: 英美烟草公司首席执行官塔德乌-马罗科（Tadeu Marroco）告诉《金融时报》，将英美烟草公司的上市地从伦敦转到纽约会造成很多内部干扰。【原文：Switching British American Tobacco Plc’s listing from London to New York would create a lot of internal distraction, Chief Executive Officer Tadeu Marroco told the Financial Times.】

item.title: 威尼斯五星级酒店为 Signa Prime 债权人带来一线希望
item.description: 威尼斯的一家五星级酒店可能是其破产所有者 Signa Prime Selection AG 的债权人挽回部分损失的最佳机会之一。【原文：A five-star hotel in Venice might just be one of the best chances for creditors of its insolvent owner, Signa Prime Selection AG, to recoup some of their losses.】

item.title: 伊朗依靠本地公司项目提高石油产量
item.description: 伊朗公布了一系列与国内公司合作提高石油产量的项目，这是该国连日来利用当地资源发展能源行业的第二项举措。【原文：Iran unveiled a series of projects to raise its oil production in collaboration with domestic companies, the country’s second initiative in days to leverage local resources to develop its energy sector.】

item.title: 顶级矿商必和必拓裁减 25% 的镍项目员工：非洲通讯社
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（Australian Financial Review）报道，全球最大的矿业公司必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）已解雇了约四分之一的工人，他们正在西澳大利亚建造西马斯格雷夫（West Musgrave）镍铜矿项目。【原文：BHP Group Ltd., the world’s largest miner, has stood down around a quarter of the workers constructing its West Musgrave nickel and copper project in Western Australia, according to a report from the Australian Financial Review.】

item.title: 波音问题导致维珍澳大利亚公司推迟交付飞机：报告
item.description: 据《悉尼先驱晨报》报道，由于波音公司的生产问题，维珍澳大利亚航空公司（Virgin Australia Airlines Pty Ltd.）推迟了接收新飞机的计划。【原文：Virgin Australia Airlines Pty Ltd. has pushed back plans to receive new aircraft due to Boeing Co. production problems, according to a Sydney Morning Herald report.】

item.title: 日本 4 万亿美元离岸基金将无视日本央行首次加息
item.description: 彭博市场实时脉搏（Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse）的最新调查显示，随着日本央行逐步收紧政策，日本资金将继续留在海外。【原文：Japanese money is poised to stay offshore as the central bank creeps toward tighter policy, according to the latest Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse survey.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对中国企业生产的墨西哥产汽车征收 100% 关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将对中国公司在墨西哥生产的汽车征收 100%的关税，比他之前表示要对美国边境以南生产的汽车征收的关税高出一倍。【原文：Donald Trump said he would hit cars made in Mexico by Chinese companies with a 100% tariff, double the levy he has previously said he would put on automobiles made south of the US border.】

item.title: 冰岛火山爆发，熔岩流再次爆发
item.description: 冰岛火山再次喷发，熔岩出现在一个渔镇附近，这个渔镇自 12 月以来已经遭受了前三次火山喷发的严重破坏。【原文：A volcanic eruption has resumed in Iceland with lava emerging near a fishing town already severely damaged from three previous eruptions at its doorstep since December.】

item.title: 几内亚在抗议和停电中解聘电力主管
item.description: 周六，几内亚国家电力公司负责人被解职，这个西非国家因多次停电引发抗议活动。【原文：The head of Guinea’s state electricity company was dismissed from his post on Saturday, with the West African nation rocked by protests after repeated power cuts.】

item.title: 美联储和日本央行主导全球近一半经济的利率周
item.description: 在各国央行为全球近一半的经济制定政策之际，投资者可能会进一步了解美联储的宽松决心，以及日本距离最终退出负利率还有多远。【原文：Investors may glean more on the Federal Reserve’s resolve to ease and how close Japan is to finally exiting negative interest rates as central banks set policy for almost half the global economy.】

item.title: 印度突击队在阿拉伯海营救被劫船只上的船员
item.description: 周六，印度海军在阿拉伯海进行了为期两天的反海盗行动，从一艘被劫持的船只上解救出 17 名人质。【原文：The Indian Navy rescued 17 hostages from a hijacked ship on Saturday after a two-day, anti-piracy operation in the Arabian Sea.】

item.title: 衍生品市场迎来万物反弹
item.description: 债券基金经理们拥有大量现金，他们转而在衍生品市场上运用这些现金，从而将违约保护成本压低到接近央行刚刚开始加息时的水平。【原文：Bond fund managers have so much cash they’re turning to the derivatives market to put it to work, pushing down the cost of protection against defaults close to levels that prevailed when central banks were just starting to raise interest rates.】

item.title: 想成为 "认证加密专家"？您需要 11 个小时和 229 美元
item.description: 要通过特许金融分析师考试并在简历上写上 "CFA "字样，建议至少学习 900 个小时。对于注册会计师考试，建议学习 300 到 400 个小时，注册会计师考试通常由已完成相关本科学位的准注册会计师参加。【原文：To pass the chartered financial analyst exams and put the “CFA” letters on your resumè, at least 900 hours of study are recommended. Hitting the books for 300 to 400 hours is advised for the certified public accountant exam, which is usually taken by prospective CPAs who have completed an undergraduate degree in the subject.】

item.title: 中国警方对中植员工采取 "强制措施
item.description: 在北京一家法院受理中植企业集团有限公司（Zhongzhi Enterprise Group Co.【原文：Chinese authorities said they took “criminal coercive measures” against some employees at the money management business of Zhongzhi Enterprise Group Co., weeks after a Beijing court accepted the shadow banking giant’s bankruptcy application.】

item.title: 美国经济从天然气熊市中获胜
item.description: 今年，美国天然气价格大幅下跌，在其他必需品价格持续上涨的情况下，却悄无声息地帮助提振了美国经济，降低了部分能源成本。【原文：The dramatic collapse of US natural gas prices this year is quietly helping to boost the nation’s economy, slashing some energy costs even as the prices of other necessities continue to rise.】

item.description:

item.title: 没有人工智能的苹果看起来更像可口可乐，而不是高增长科技公司
item.description: 二十年来，没有哪家公司比苹果公司更能体现股票市场的前景。从利基电脑制造商到全球最有价值的公司，苹果公司的股票成为全球投资组合的基石。【原文：For two decades, no company better embodied the promise of the stock market than Apple Inc. Its transformation from niche computer maker to the most valuable corporation on the planet made its shares a cornerstone of investment portfolios worldwide.】

item.title: 印度将于四月启动大选，莫迪角逐第三个任期
item.description: 印度将从 4 月 19 日起举行为期六周的大选，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪将在强劲的经济和印度教民众的支持下争取第三次连任。【原文：India will hold general elections over six weeks from April 19, with Prime Minister Narendra Modi bidding for a third term in office, buoyed by a strong economy and support from his Hindu base.】

item.title: 德国铁路运营商结束罢工，下周达成协议
item.description: 德国铁路运营商德国铁路公司（Deutsche Bahn AG）和火车司机工会 GDL 正在恢复谈判，并有信心在下周达成协议，这表明在此之前不会再发生罢工。【原文：German rail operator Deutsche Bahn AG and train drivers’ union GDL are resuming negotiations and are confident of reaching an agreement next week, signaling there will be no further strikes until then.】
